column4: i need some help with my shell.... i want to copy all files of a dir to another dir, but the copied files should have a prefix at the beginning of their name (i.e. 'PREFIX<old filename>' ). How to do that?
hmmm... where to find a bash channel or perhaps a goot tutorial?
